item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 1, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:

9. Don't build your castle in other people's kingdoms (2021) (80 points | 36 comments)
10. Verdn (YC W22) is hiring software engineers to build next-gen donation APIs ( | hide)
